name: DataStarCmdLine
description: Executes the DataStar Command Line Utility
author: Absolute Technology Limited

inputs.name: ModeType
inputs.label: Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the mode type depending on whether you want to deploy, reverse, generate or extract history.

inputs.name: ManifestDir
inputs.label: Manifest Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of the package (i.e. the parent folder of the manifest file)

inputs.name: WithReversal
inputs.label: With Reversal
inputs.helpMarkDown: The optional with reversal switch, to generate reversal scripts.

inputs.name: TemplateDir
inputs.label: TemplateDir
inputs.helpMarkDown: The optional templates directory, only required if generating reversal scripts.

inputs.name: OutputDir
inputs.label: Output Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The optional output directory, only required if generating reversal scripts.

inputs.name: Artifacts
inputs.label: Artifacts
inputs.helpMarkDown: The optional manifest files to include, defaults to wildcard.

inputs.name: HistoryId
inputs.label: HistoryId
inputs.helpMarkDown: The optional id of the deployment being reversed, used in reversal mode.

inputs.name: WorkItem
inputs.label: Work Item Reference
inputs.visibleRule: ModeType = Deployment || ModeType = Reversal || ModeType = History
inputs.helpMarkDown: The optional work item reference.

inputs.name: Version
inputs.label: Version Reference
inputs.helpMarkDown: The optional version reference.

inputs.name: HO-WithReversal
inputs.label: With Reversal Scripts
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this box to extract the reversal scripts.

inputs.name: HO-WithLogOutput
inputs.label: With Log Output
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this box to extract logs.

inputs.name: HO-OutputDir
inputs.label: Output Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The output directory

inputs.name: HO-AuditTable
inputs.label: Audit Table Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional override for the audit database table name.

inputs.name: HO-ReversalTable
inputs.label: Reversal Table Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional override for the reversal database table name.

inputs.name: LicenseKey
inputs.label: License Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The required license key.

inputs.name: DataSource
inputs.label: Data Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: The database server and instance

inputs.name: Database
inputs.label: Database
inputs.helpMarkDown: The database name.

inputs.name: Username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional username if not using default credentials

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional password if not using default credentials. **Use a Variable to encrypt the Password.**

inputs.name: Audit
inputs.label: Enable Auditing
inputs.helpMarkDown: The enable auditing switch, to generate audit records in the target database.

inputs.name: AuditTable
inputs.label: Audit Table Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional override for the audit database table name.

inputs.name: ReversalTable
inputs.label: Reversal Table Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional override for the reversal database table name.

inputs.name: SummaryTable
inputs.label: Summary Table Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional override for the summary database table name.

inputs.name: GO-TemplateDir
inputs.label: Template Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory containing the DataStar template(s).

inputs.name: GO-TemplateName
inputs.label: Template Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the DataStar template to use.

inputs.name: GO-DynamicQuery
inputs.label: Dynamic Query
inputs.helpMarkDown: The optional override to the dynamic query in the template.

inputs.name: GO-FormattingOptions
inputs.label: Formatting Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: The optional formatting rules for the component file names, this can be specified as XML as per the <FormattingRules> element defined in the DataStar UI workspace file or as a JSON string.

inputs.name: GO-OutputDir
inputs.label: Output Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The output directory where the scripts should be generated.

inputs.name: GO-DeleteCheck
inputs.label: Include Delete Check
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true any additional files (i.e. those not identified in the template dynamic queries) will be re-extracted using the parameters contained in those files.

inputs.name: BasePath
inputs.label: Base Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The optional path to the DataStar.CmdLine Executable, if not specified the working directory is used.

inputs.name: MaxDop
inputs.label: Max Degree of Parallelism
inputs.helpMarkDown: Controls the maximum number of concurrent threads allowed when extracting components.

inputs.name: FailOnStderr
inputs.label: Fail on Standard Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will fail if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.

instanceNameFormat: Execute the DataStar Command Line Utility
